component.text: Determines the type of technology that must be supported. For example, 802.11b, 802.11g, 802.11n or Mixed Mode.
Used to identify the WLAN. All devices that wish to participate in the WLAN must have the same SSID.
Specifies the channel over which communication will occur. By default, this is set to Auto to allow the AP to determine the optimum channel to use.
Determines if the SSID will be broadcast to all devices within range. By default set to Enable.
Click each wireless setting for more information.
